bibl.title: Euripides' Other Hippolytus.
bibl.note: Discusses the relationship between the two Hippolytus plays in the light of P. Oxy. LXVIII, 4640 + P. Mich. Inv. 6222a [ed.: Wolfgang LUPPE, Die Hypothesis zum ersten 'Hippolytos' (P. Mich. inv. 6222a), ZPE 102 (1994) pp. 23-39 et pl. I a].
bibl.seg: Discusses the relationship between the two Hippolytus plays in the light of P. Oxy. LXVIII, 4640 + P. Mich. Inv. 6222a [ed.: Wolfgang LUPPE, Die Hypothesis zum ersten 'Hippolytos' (P. Mich. inv. 6222a), ZPE 102 (1994) pp. 23-39 et pl. I a].
